price: Imana Allah Yafashe isezerano kuri abo Bavugishwamana kugira Izobabaze ku kungene bumviwe n’abo barungitsweko, Iheze Ihembe abemeramana Ubwami bw’ijuru, Yaranategekanirije abagarariji ibihano bibabaza ku musi w’izuka.
arabic: لِّيَسۡـَٔلَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ عَن صِدۡقِهِمۡۚ وَأَعَدَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا

meta.transliteration: liyasala al-ṣādiqīna ʿan ṣid'qihim wa-aʿadda lil'kāfirīna ʿadhāban alīman
